comp124graphics

Class GraphicsObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • comp124graphics.GraphicsObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Arc, Ellipse, GraphicsGroup, GraphicsText, Image, Line, Rectangle

    public abstract class GraphicsObject
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class representing some sort of graphical object that can be drawn and positioned in a canvaswindow. Created by bjackson on 9/13/2016.

      Gets the position of the object on the canvas.
